```{r, include= FALSE}
library(car)
library(emmeans)
library(lme4)
library(lmerTest)
library(patchwork)
library(glmmTMB)
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
getwd()

data1= read.csv(file="KG_WeatherData.csv")

str(data1)
```


```{r}
data1$Month= factor(data1$Month, levels=c("April", "May", "June", "July","August","September", "October", "November"))
Temperature= ggplot(data1, aes(x= Month))+
  geom_bar( aes(y=Temp), stat= "identity")+
  facet_grid(.~Site_Yr,)+
  coord_flip()

Temperature
```

```{r}
Precipitation= ggplot(data1, aes(x= Month))+
  geom_bar( aes(y=Precip), stat= "identity")+
  facet_grid(.~Site_Yr,)

Precipitation
```
